email: The email must be a valid email address.
regex_tags: The {attr}'s format contain invalid tags / characters.
boolean: The {attr} must be a boolean value.
min.file: The {attr} must be at least {min} kilobytes.
min.string: The {attr} must be at least {min} characters.
min.array: The {attr} must have at least {min} items.
max.numeric: The {attr} may not be greater than {max}.
max.file: The {attr} may not be greater than {max} kilobytes.
max.string: The {attr} may not be greater than {max} characters.
max.array: The {attr} may not have more than {max} items.
confirmed: The confirmation field of {attr} does not match.
captcha: Please confirm that you are not a robot.
